title.rendered: EDISON ANGELO Luxury That Empowers You

content.rendered:
Edison Angelo is developed as an architectural masterpiece. Through ingenuity and thorough engineering efforts by the best and top architectural minds at Edison Real Estate. Edison Real Estate successfully made a statement of pure class and premium living through Edison Angelo. This beautiful project is located in I block of Bashundhara R/A, adjacent to Walton Corporate Office, Dhali Fitness Center and Awake Coffee Roasters. It successfully reinvents luxurious living as a lifestyle to cherish.

Accommodating a wide host of luxurious amenities, Edison Angelo is an exemplary craft of a living to enjoy. Every visitor is welcome with an ingress lawn and gratifying reception. There is a delightful open lounge with sitting arrangements. For community purposes, there is a communal meeting room and a community hall with outdoor extension. There is a beautiful pool at the rooftop. The rooftop also features a juice bar and beautiful lounge. The roof is landscape for real comfort and style. There is a fully equipper gymnasium. A dedicated cloth drying zone. A raised platform for BBQ’s get together. It is a south facing building. There are ten floors with nine apartments. Each apartment is massive four thousand square feet space. Each apartment is decorate using the most premium materials and state of the art fittings. Edison Angelo houses total nine apartments with double parking facility.

Edison Angelo is a paragon of architectural beauty. This is top choice of living for those who seek a lifestyle that is above the norm.
